answers.answer: Oh wow. I wish I got a sonogram every week. But I bet that'll get old going there so often :/

Well i had a sonogram today and one last week and so far its exciting to see the different positions hes in last week he was head down giving us the "Rock On" hand gesture lol and today he was sideways moving all over the place lol so i get a kick out of it.... im just running out of space for the pictures they print out for me lol
Haha well in that aspect your really lucky. I'm 36+5 and have only had 2 ultrasounds. Last time I saw my baby girl was 18 weeks. The next time I see her she'll be in my arms

question: Im 26+2 i have gestational diabetes so im a high risk pregnancy. I went to my ob today and  he told me that i will have an appointment every week as well as a weekly sonogram... i guess i cant complain i get to see christopher every week but i feel its to early to be going every week...
title: doc appointment
